name: Gmail Dark Side Panel Only
description: This is based on the "New Gmail Dark Theme Tweaks - Gmail 2018" style.  This only provide dark theme to the right side panel (tasks, calendar, keep).  This style has additional style tweaks to provide better contrast with fonts, icons, popup windows especially in tasks and keep.
additional_info: The  "New Gmail Dark Theme Tweaks - Gmail 2018" is located here https://userstyles.org/styles/159026/new-gmail-dark-theme-tweaks-gmail-2018
